1578470.description:
Hide Seek Survive

Experience audio-based horror as you search for a hidden supernatural doll seven times while avoiding a demonic stalker in a darkened house.

Gameplay:

  • Track the demon through 3D spatial audio - footsteps and door sounds reveal its location

  • Find dolls hidden behind furniture using environmental clues and supernatural laughs

  • Hide in closets and manage three lives as your flashlight's vision narrows with each mistake

  • 15-minute sessions with randomized layouts for high replayability

Key Features:

  • Strategic demon AI with learnable patrol patterns

  • 3D spatial audio system for precise tracking

  • Optimized for 60+ FPS on budget hardware

  • Full controller support
